entry.title: "It'll Be So Easy"
entry.summary:
Author: Book_Sniffer

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,015Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 1

Summary: The Hale Murder House isn't haunted. Obviously. That notion is just ridiculous. Some homeless person might have taken shelter there, if the stories are to be believed and why wouldn't they? It's enormous, it mostly still stands and it has been years since the fire that wiped out most of the Hale family. So many years. It's nothing. Not really even a murder house, people are just being superstitious. So what if it's a full moon, Beacon Hills is boring and you might as well take a look at it. What's the worst that could happen?

entry.title: The Wolf at Winter’s Door
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,925Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 22

Summary: Winter is closing in on the Hale valley when Derek—an exiled alpha turned recluse—finds a half-frozen omega and a baby in the snow outside his cottage. He should have left them to the storm; he’s learned what kindness costs. But the sound of the infant’s cry, and the scent of something wild and familiar in the omega’s skin, pull at the part of him that still remembers how to protect, how to care, how to love.As the snow deepens and the fire burns low, Derek’s solitude unravels thread by thread.The omega’s name is Stiles—a runaway from a war Derek has long tried to forget. He carries secrets, grief, and a child who isn’t meant to survive the winter.In a world of fading magic, hunters, and ghosts of kingdoms lost to fire, two wounded souls find warmth in each other’s silence.But the past always finds its way through the snow.

entry.title: Our Little Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Devil_Lighting19

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,592Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: {WARNING: Bad language, Blood and harm, Stalking, Sexual themes} What if Teen Wolf had a twist?In the town of Beacon Hills, there lived four half brothers. All of them done their own things and some of them exhaled on a lot of things. But what happens when these four half brothers cross paths with the well known Hale half brothers? and that's when their entire lives start to slowly change, for the better? or for the worst.

entry.title: Holiday Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ieatassforbreakfast009

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,064Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 91

Summary: All Stiles wanted was to give the Hale Pack a normal holiday season—tree decorating, sugar cookies, and zero supernatural explosions. Unfortunately, the wolves are competitive about everything, Derek is allergic to fun, and Stiles’ spark might actually explode from holiday stress. Still, if it means giving the pack a family again, Stiles is willing to drag them through holiday hell… one disaster at a time.

entry.title: Hard to Kill
entry.summary:
Author: Lalaith_Quetzalli

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,681Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 65

Summary: Mieczyslaw Jan Gajos Stilinski was born into a lineage of power, and duty. With the power and will to carry on the legacy of his ancestors, and more. And no matter who gets in his way, who tries to push him back, to take him down, in the end he will always be the last one standing. For even if he might be only human, in this world of magic and monsters, he knows that humans can sometimes be stronger than even gods…

entry.title: Ours, No Take-Backs Now
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,002Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 18

Summary: Third in the What We Leave Behind, What We Carry Forward series.Derek and Stiles are already an established thing—bonded, messy, and very much in love. But now that Stiles is a werewolf, every touch, every fight, every promise burns hotter than he ever thought possible.Derek’s juggling therapy, building a pack, and trying to keep Stiles from self-destructing while the Kanima stalks the night and the Argents close in. Love, survival, and pack aren’t separate anymore.They’re the same fight.The thing about werewolves? They meant it literally when they came up with ‘no take-backs.’

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,814Chapters: 19/20Kudos: 312

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,445Chapters: 9/23Kudos: 69

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.
